item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 13 Apr 2021
item.description:
1. ocaml-wayland (pure OCaml wayland protocol library)
  2. Reparse v2.1.0 release
  3. Open source editor for iOS, iPadOS and macOS
  4. OCaml Caf√© - Tue, Apr 13 @ 7pm Central
  5. Directories, an ocaml library
  6. Multicore OCaml: March 2021
  7. ML Family Workshop 2021: first call for short abstracts and presentations
  8. ppx_let_locs - improve stack traces
  9. Converting typing information from one OCaml version to a later one?
  10. Set up OCaml 1.1.10
